result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant waives her right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 1 for further proceedings.  Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.  
ARRAIGNMENT 
Information filed.  Not guilty pleas.  Jury Calendar.  Settlement conference with the District Attorney is set for 08-28-14 at 10:00 a.m.   State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.

Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.  Preliminary hearing is set for 07-30-14 at 2:45 p.m.

Initial appearance reset to 07-21-14 at 2:30 p.m.

Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.

Eric Pangburn, through public defender.
Defendant failed to appear for initial appearance.   Bench warrant authorized.

At 1:58 p.m., $50.00 cash bail furnished and the defendant is released from custody.
Notice to Party Furnishing Cash Bail.

Defendant in custody on arrest warrant.  The matter is continued for an initial appearance on 07-14-14 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $50.00 cash with the conditions that she must report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours of release and that she have no contact with Tracy Zipperer.  Bail not furnished and the defendant is remanded into custody. Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued.  Copy filed.
